name: InVisM
overview:
InVisM, Inc., a technology and services company, provides dimensional audios, live-action videos, and gaming technologies for the training needs of government, commercial, pharmaceutical sales, corporate, education, and industrial markets. The companyâ€™s services include systems integration, program management, visualization techniques, prototype development process, cinema and special effects production, and product support, as well as identification, protection, and capitalization of intellectual property. Its technologies include Serious Games, the computer and video games-based technology used to educate or persuade; development environments for developers to create software cost, balance software development resources and output, model and visualize energy, and performance for software applications; and RealityV, an InVisM platform technology designed to deliver training and simulation. InVisM, Inc. has a strategic partnership with Foundation 9 Entertainment. The company was formerly known as Intelligence Gaming, Inc.

InVisM, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Greenwood Village, Colorado.
